item.description:
Well, I guess its time for a new location for the November meetup! I am thinking that perhaps we venture to a new locaiton....how about CHOW in New Haven? It is cozy and has great sangria!

Let me know if this works for everyone! I do look forward to seeing you all for a pre-holiday Sunday soiree!

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: 40's...Let's Get Together and have Fun! November Meetup
